name: Fairyland: Manuscript (itch)
description:
The war between the Great Kingdom of Rukand and Fairyland still has not ended. 
A pupil of the Great Academy of Higher Magic enters the prohibited library to get access to powerful new spells. 

Out of ignorance, she unseals the Damned Manuscript and releases the Dark Essence. Left alone with the creatures from the Abyss, she has to seal the Manuscript to save her life and sanity.

To start the game click on the magical seal in the center of the screen and destroy it. Done? Great! Now you need to put it back before the Damned Manuscript drives you mad. To do this, flip 50 pages of the manuscript and defeat the monster, a prisoner on the last page. It is not necessary to defeat other monsters.
